#include <iostream>

using namespace std;

long long f(long long n) {
    n --;
    n |= n >> 1;
    n |= n >> 2;
    n |= n >> 4;
    n |= n >> 8;
    n |= n >> 16;
    n ++;
    return n;
}

int main() {
    long long t, n;
    cin >> t;
    while(t --) {
        cin >> n;
        if((n & (n - 1)) == 0) {
            cout << n << endl;
        } else {
            cout << f(n) / 2 << endl;
        }
    }
	return 0;
}
